review:
游戏更新慢，平衡差（以owl为标准平衡，不考虑普通玩家体验），过分强调团队配合，对新手不友好，赢一把不会让人很开心但输一局能恶心人一天。
从ow1宣布停止更新起过了快5年了，你告诉我你更新了一个氪金系统，一个大号的威尼斯行动的pve，新英雄和新地图一只手数得过来。
没经历过那个夏天的话就别经历了，不值得

team fortress 2 got an update before overwatch 2 diverged from the first game

There's a lot to say about Overwatch and what it's become, but put semi-briefly, it's a game that was the definition of lightning in a bottle that slowly went out over the course of its 6 years of life. Overwatch 2 is an attempt to revive that spark despite being managed by an awful company. You can tell the devs are trying their best but funding and time are being cut in favor of microtransactions and CEO/shareholder payouts. It has its faults, sure, but people pretend like the game is the scourge of humanity when it's still a fully playable and enjoyable free-to-play game. The art direction, character design, and cinematics all work together to create a vibrant universe that feels engaging to play with friends. It's a very polished game with good movement, creative abilities, and a wide roster of heroes and maps. I've spent many days of my life (1700 hours) playing through ups and downs, but overall it's been a blast. The widespread criticism of the management choices is more than deserved (I'm looking at you, skill trees), but the insistent burning hate isn't. It's far from perfect, but it's 100% worth giving a shot.

This game is a pale shadow of it's former self. Extremely predatory and expensive, this game shouldn't be called a sequel. Even Blizzard and Valve agree with this because the game's folder is just "Overwatch".
     I hate and I never buy online only games, but I bought Overwatch when it came out and I loved it, but what happened with that game is a tragedy.
     Also, I pre-loaded it and then I had to re-download the whole game for some reason, I had to delete it 3 times to get it to work. Blizzard, get your games together.

Almost a thousand hours in , I can absolutely say this is the peak of multy player hero shooter, defining an era and a genre, sure Blizz management makes shady evil choices , thirsty for your coin, but in the end you decide, after all its free to play, the only thing you miss out on are skins, which are pretty cool, some of them.

39 heroes , amazing interactions, great graphics, great team based gameplay, behind a medium sized learning curve, but when it works, the experience cant be beat,

The PvE was killed, and its corpse is being sold in pieces, but you can just watch a youtube video of the thing and not miss out on much...

Highly recommended and probably gonna play it for another 1000 hours more.

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

来点客观评价
暴雪、考迪克死一死的话估计无数人在刷了，总要谈点客观的，不然会有些自觉中立的人说点未经他人苦，却劝他人善的风凉话

先说公事：
停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

再聊私事：
账号承载着老玩家的青春回忆，见证了和朋友一起欢笑犯糗的时光。你说没就没，这就是您说的为了玩家？向钱看嘛，不寒掺，哪怕您站直了脊梁骨，说几句真话，我对您的鄙夷也能少那么几分，来洗的暴白也会多一点。中国玩家不重要，但中国玩家的真金白银很重要。


新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。
This game robbed me of my time (405 hours) but it won't rob me of my money.

taffy爱玩

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.
